Package de.awi.floenavigation.helperclasses

Provides different activities, classes and interfaces which ensure the smooth operation of the App.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FragmentChangeListener
    This Interface provides Activities and Fragments with a method to replace the currently running fragment with another Fragment.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionBarActivity
    This Activity creates and maintains the icons on the ActionBar at the top of the screen.
    DatabaseHelper
    This class provides the methods necessary to Setup and Maintain the SQLiteDatabase of the App.
    DialogActivity
    This Activity creates and displays different type of Dialogs according to the parameters passed to it in its calling Intent.
    EntrySplashScreen
    This Activity is the first activity to run whenever the App is launched on the tablet.
    NavigationFunctions
    This Class provides methods to calculate different Navigation parameters used by the App.

Package de.awi.floenavigation.helperclasses Description

Provides different activities, classes and interfaces which ensure the smooth operation of the App. It includes classes for accessing the local Database, calculating different navigation parameters and activities for maintaining the interface of the App. The Activities and methods provided by this package are used by other activities and background services.
